bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Definite-Purpose Switching Devices for Use in Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear Amendment 1: Revise Short-Circuit Rating and Test Requirement
IEEE Standard for Definite-Purpose Switching Devices for Use in Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear Amendment 1: Revise Short-Circuit Rating and Test Requirement
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.13.1a-2010 (Amendment to IEEE Std C37.13.1-2006)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to the standard revises the short-circuit rating and test requirements for definite-purpose switching devices for use in metal-enclosed low-voltage power circuit breaker switchgear.

This amendment to IEEE Std C37.13.1-2006 revises the short-circuit rating and test requirements for definite-purpose switching devices for use in metal-enclosed low-voltage power circuit breaker switchgear.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
